name: Advanced Programming
description:
A collection of three online courses which build on the introduction to Python course earlier in the programme and introduce two new programming languages R and Javascript. 

Course 1 - To prove completion of the online course, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificate provided by the course provider. We do not have access to course providers assessment criteria.

Course 2 - There is no evidence to be submitted for the completion of these modules, once the materials have been reviewed the students self declare completion.

Course 3 - There is no evidence to be submitted for the completion of these modules, once the materials have been reviewed the students self declare completion.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete all the online courses and the associated exercises to be awarded the digital badge.
